description.value: Simpsonette anti-mosquito hood, gauze mesh and metal ribs, United Kingdom, 1901-1930

details.transcription: "THE SIMPSONETTE"/(Patent No. 109219)/ Anti-Mosquito/Helmet./AN INVALUABLE/PROTECTOR/AGAINST/MOSQUITO, TSETSE/AND SAND FLIES. /THE MOSQUITO...

note.value: Contains instructions how to wear the hood

details.transcription: Instructions for the use of "The Simpsonette" Mosquito Headgear

note.value: instructions for use

details.transcription: THE "SIMPSONETTE"/UNIVERSAL ANTI-MOSQUITO and/FLY PROTECTIVE HEADGEAR or HOOD. Patent 109219./An invaluable protection for the Soldier, Nurse and Civilian against Malaria, Yellow Fever, Sleeping Sickness, Sandfly Fever, Opththalmia, and other diseases conveyed by/winged insects; also against the annoyance and injury caused by such insects.  Is useful/for Bee-keepers, Planters, Travellers, prospectors, Settelrs and Exploreers, and protects Anglers from the annoyance of gnats and midges./.../Send a "SIMPSONETTE" to your friends abroad.

note.value: contains a testimony, how to wear and where to buy.
